lines.text: Don't let them knockers hypnotize you, boy!
You're fuckin' with the devil now, boy.
There is no such thing as pain.
I have been pushed around my whole life by men, and I'm sick of it!
This is a war, not a game.

[on walkie talkie]
Eagle 2, those bitches are coming your way.
I thought you mercenaries were men of your word.
Well then pay up, you son of a bitch.
